name: Outworld Staff
description: Proof that the lone sentinel was not always so.

abilities.name: Self-Exile
abilities.description: Briefly places the wielder into an astral prison. The hidden wielder is invulnerable and disabled.
notes: Fully disables the caster and turns them invulnerable and hidden
Upon returning, the wielder takes damage based on their maximum health. This damage is not lethal
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the duration is increased by 30%

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics
